intents.name: Compliance Check
intents.description: Performs compliance checks based on SEBI regulations and fraud schema.
examples: Check if my transactions comply with SEBI regulations.
Perform a compliance check for my portfolio.
Is this transaction compliant with SEBI rules?

intents.name: Broker API Integration
intents.description: Integrates with broker APIs to fetch real-time compliance data and reports.
examples: Fetch compliance reports from the broker API.
Integrate with the broker API for real-time data.
Get the latest compliance data from my broker.

name: SEBIBot
scope: Handles compliance reporting by adhering to SEBI fraud schema and integrating with broker APIs for real-time data.
